title: [Question] Mathematics 3rd sem for CSE
content: How do u even study this subject? is it tb needed ? what qs to solve or is the theory needed, i hv isa in like 2 weeks no idea whatsoever to do lmao, atleast 1st yr maths had well defined stuff to do.

comments.body: Contrary to other subjects, slides are enough for MCSE. Go through them diligently and solve all the problems there. Usually the teacher sends some practice problems closer to ISAs, they are very helpful, do those too. In case your teacher hasn't sent those, solve previous year questions to get the hang of it.
Just go through the slide questions and work book questions that some prof's give , should be more than enough.
